text.headline: AI Through the Ages
text.text: Group 20: Senthoor Krishnaraju, Edward Song, Pranav Hedge

text.headline: Theseus the Maze-solving Mouse
text.text: Claude Shannon builds an electromechanical mouse that learns to navigate a maze, illustrating machine learning concepts.

media.caption: Claude Shannon's Theseus, a foundational experiment in AI.

text.headline: Perceptron Mark I Algorithm
text.text: Frank Rosenblatt invents the Perceptron, an early neural network model designed for pattern recognition.

media.caption: Frank Rosenblatt, creator of the Perceptron.

text.headline: ELIZA - Early Chatbot
text.text: Joseph Weizenbaum develops ELIZA, one of the first chatbots, simulating conversation using pattern matching and scripted responses.

media.caption: ELIZA, a pioneering chatbot demonstrating natural language processing.

text.headline: Cray X-MP: First Supercompute to process 1 GFLOP
TD-Gammon
text.text: Gerald Tesauro develops TD-Gammon, a backgammon-playing AI using reinforcement learning, achieving near-expert play.

media.caption: TD-Gammon, one of the first successful uses of reinforcement learning.

text.headline: NASA Beowulf Project
text.text: NASA introduced the beowulf project as an alternative to supercomputers. Basic idea is that you have a cluster of processors that run in parallel.

text.headline: Deep Blue Defeats Kasparov
text.text: IBM's Deep Blue defeats world chess champion Garry Kasparov, showcasing brute-force search and evaluation strategies.

media.caption: Deep Blue's victory marked a milestone in game-playing AI.

text.headline: NVIDIA releases CUDA
text.text: NVIDIA created CUDA, which introduced GPU computing. These innovations drastically increased the computational power of processing. Made Geforce GTX 280

text.headline: AlexNet Wins ImageNet
text.text: AlexNet, a deep convolutional neural network, wins the ImageNet competition by a large margin using CUDA and NVIDIA gpus, demonstrating the power of deep learning. Used NVIDIA GPUs and Cuda for parallel GPU computations. Using convolutional neural networks and leveraging the computational power of GPUs, AlexNet demonstrated that machines could achieve superhuman performance in image classification when designed effectively

media.caption: AlexNet's success popularized deep learning techniques.

text.headline: AlphaGo Defeats Lee Sedol
text.text: DeepMind's AlphaGo defeats world Go champion Lee Sedol, demonstrating the potential of deep reinforcement learning.

media.caption: AlphaGo marked a significant advance in AI game playing.

text.headline: BERT: Breakthrough in NLP
text.text: Google's BERT model significantly improves natural language understanding tasks, establishing a new standard for NLP benchmarks.

media.caption: BERT demonstrated the potential of transformer models in NLP.

text.headline: GPT-2 Released
text.text: OpenAI releases GPT-2, demonstrating coherent and versatile natural language generation with 1.5 billion parameters.

media.caption: GPT-2 significantly advanced natural language generation.

text.headline: AlphaFold Solves Protein Folding
text.text: DeepMind's AlphaFold predicts protein structures with unprecedented accuracy, solving a decades-old biological problem.

text.headline: GPT-4 Released
text.text: OpenAI's GPT-4 pushes language generation boundaries, enabling complex text generation and reasoning capabilities.

media.caption: GPT-4, a leading LLM for natural language tasks.
